TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpSessionStateContainer extends System.Object implements class System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState

summary.span: 包含当前请求的会话状态值和会话级别设置。

span.span: Contains session-state values as well as session-level settings for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了会话状态管理，使您可以存储与唯一的浏览器会话关联跨多个请求的信息。ASP.NET provides session-state management to enable you to store information associated with a unique browser session across multiple requests. 你可以存储引用按密钥名称或数字索引的值的集合。You can store a collection of values referenced by a key name or by numerical index. 对会话的值和功能的访问是使用类，该类可通过访问属性的当前或属性。Access to session values and functionality is available using the class, which is accessible through the property of the current or the property of the . 类访问会话状态的值和会话级设置，通过引用的会话状态容器，即的实现接口已填充会话状态数据并添加到当前请求的会话状态模块通过。The class accesses session-state values and session-level settings by referencing a session-state container, which is an implementation of the interface that has been populated with session-state data and added to the of the current request by the session-state module for the . 类调用类，该类管理会话设置和在内存中的值。The class calls the class, which manages session settings and values in memory. 类是 ASP.NET 实现接口。The class is the ASP.NET implementation of the interface. 类不应从应用程序代码中调用。The class is not intended to be called from application code. 如果你替换借助自定义会话状态模块，你可以使用类，或提供您自己的实现接口。If you replace the with a custom session-state module, you can use the class, or supply your own implementation of the interface. ## Examples 有关使用的自定义会话状态模块的示例类作为当前请求的会话状态容器，请参阅类概述。For an example of a custom session-state module that uses the class as the session-state container for the current request, see the class overview.

summary.span: 创建一个新的 对象，并使用指定的设置和值对其初始化。

span.span: Creates a new object and initializes it with the specified settings and values.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示填充新的自定义会话状态模块的事件处理程序对象使用新的或现有的会话信息，并将其添加到当前请求使用方法。The following code example shows the event handler for a custom session-state module that populates a new object with new or existing session information and adds it to the of the current request using the method. 有关自定义会话状态模块的完整代码示例，请参阅类概述。For a full code example of a custom session-state module, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abandon() cil managed

summary.span: 把当前会话标记为已放弃。

span.span: Marks the current session as abandoned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法标记属性作为`true`。The method of the marks the property as `true`. 然后可以查询自定义会话模块属性，并删除会话信息，如果属性是`true`。A custom session module can then query the property and remove the session information if the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CodePage { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当前会话的字符集标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character-set identifier for the current session.

value.span: 当前会话的字符集标识符。

span.span: The character-set identifier for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符集 （代码页） 用于解释多字节字符数据，确定字符值，并因此排序顺序。A character set (code page) is used to interpret multibyte character data, determining character value, and therefore sort order. 代码页设置仅适用于多字节字符数据，而不是 Unicode 字符数据。Code-page settings apply only to multibyte character data, not to Unicode character data. 这以便兼容 ASP 的早期版本仅提供属性。This property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果你不需要为了保持向后的兼容性 ASP 页，使用属性改为。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以便兼容 ASP 的早期版本仅提供属性。The property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果你不需要为了保持向后的兼容性 ASP 页，使用属性改为。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead. ASP.NET 不会在会话状态中存储的区域设置标识符。ASP.NET does not store the locale identifier in session state. 属性访问属性来获取和设置的标识符。The property accesses the property to get and set the identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果页面上的对象不支持序列化和是进程外 (或)，该对象将不会创建，并且将不会添加到此集合。If an object on a page does not support serialization and is out-of-process ( or ), the object will not be created and will not be added to this collection. 提供 ，以便兼容 ASP 的早期版本。 is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.

summary.span: 获取并设置在会话状态提供程序终止会话之前各请求之间所允许的时间（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: Gets and sets the amount of time, in minutes, allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.

span.span: The time-out period, in minutes.

exception.span: 尝试将 值设置为小于 1 的整数值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the value to an integer value less than 1.
\- or -

exception.span: 在 设置为 或 的条件下，尝试将 值设置为大于最大允许值的整数值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the value to an integer value greater than the maximum allowed when is set to or .
The maximum allowed is 525,600 (one year).
